hero.title: Researcher & Engineer
hero.description: M.Sc. Student in Electrical Engineering at National Taiwan Normal University, specializing in Reinforcement Learning and Deep Reinforcement Learning for Humanoid Robotics

about.title: About Me
about.subtitle: Passionate researcher exploring the intersection of AI, robotics, and human-computer interaction
about.backgroundText1: I am currently pursuing my M.Sc. in Electrical Engineering at National Taiwan Normal University, where my research focuses on Reinforcement Learning and Deep Reinforcement Learning applications in Humanoid Robotics.
about.backgroundText2: With a strong foundation in Computer Engineering from the University of Tabriz, I have developed extensive experience in machine learning, deep learning, and practical AI implementations.
about.currentWorkText1: At the Educational Robotics Center (ERC) at NTNU, I work with cutting-edge technologies including NVIDIA Isaac Lab, Isaac Sim, and Proximal Policy Optimization (PPO) algorithms to advance the field of humanoid robotics.
about.currentWorkText2: My research aims to bridge the gap between theoretical RL concepts and practical robotic applications, contributing to more intelligent and adaptive robotic systems.

erc.title: Internship Student
erc.description: Research at RL and Deep RL Humanoid Robotics
highlights: Conducted research on reinforcement learning for humanoid robots
Implemented PPO algorithms in Isaac Lab and Isaac Sim
Collaborated with research team on cutting-edge robotics projects

sobh.title: Artificial Intelligence Researcher
sobh.description: Working on AOI (Automated Optical Inspection) in the field of artificial intelligence
highlights: Developed AI-powered automated optical inspection system for PCB manufacturing
Implemented computer vision models for electronic component inspection
Created deep learning solution for circuit solder quality inspection
Applied NLP and computer vision techniques for both front and back board inspection

contact.subtitle: I'm always open to discussing research opportunities, collaborations, or interesting projects
contact.researchText: Feel free to reach out if you're interested in collaborating on projects related to Machine Learning, Reinforcement Learning, Robotics, or any of my research areas.
